item.title: Processes and Threads
item.description: In this article, I present an overview of processes and threads. Processes A process can be explained as “a program being executed“. A process is not a program. You can have n processes for the same program. For example, when you open a tab in Chrome, it creates a new process called Google Chrome Helper (Renderer). So, Google Chrome can have multiple processes. In the image above, I have multiple Chrome processes.
